channel.title: North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Roheen BE
Accomodation
item.description: As much as possible we try and keep things local for both, the authenticity and sustainabilty of it.

item.title: Active Adventure Holidays in Northeast India
item.description: We offer Active Adventure tours for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): The Rainforest Trek | TREKKING & WILDLIFE TOUR
item.description: A walk in India’s easternmost wildlife park This trekking holiday takes you to the Namdapha National Park located in eastern Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Assam Family Holiday: Jewels of the Brahmaputra
item.description: Family Holiday in Assam: Jewels of the Brahmaputra Valley The setting for this family holiday is the lush Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Cycle tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Watershed of the Brahmaputra
item.description: Cycle tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Birth of the Brahmaputra Valley This cycle tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh (the eastern most state of India) takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: Eastern Arunachal Pradesh & Upper Assam: Birth of the Brahmaputra | RIVER TRIP
item.description: Birth of the Mighty Brahmaputra This river journey takes you to eastern Arunachal Pradesh and Upper Assam.

item.title: Multi-Activity Holiday in Assam: Tea, Wildlife & Culture
item.description: Multi-Activity Holiday in Assam: The Brahmaputra Valley This multi-activity tour takes us to the Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Trans-Meghalaya Motorcycle & Overland Tour: Backroads of Meghalaya
item.description: Trans Meghalaya Motorcycle & Overland Tour: The abode of clouds explored Starting from Guwahati the capital of Assam, this motorcycle / overland tour takes you through little known secluded roads of Meghalaya.

item.title: Walking Tour of Meghalaya: Walks in the clouds
item.description: Walking Tour of Meghalaya: Explorations in the ‘Abode of Clouds’ This Walking holiday takes you to beautiful Meghalaya, ‘The Abode of clouds’.

item.title: Wildlife Tour of Assam: Parks of the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Wildlife Tour of Assam: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.

item.title: Ezhil Vasanthan
Food
item.description: There is a great variety in cuisines between the communities of this region.

item.title: Nature & Culture tours of Northeast India
item.description: These 8 states lying in the Indo-Burmese and the Himalayan Bio-diversity hotspots are also home to over 150 unique and distinct ethinic groups.

item.title: Cultural Tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Theravada & Animist lands
item.description: Cultural Tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Theravada & Animist lands We take you to one of the least known part of Northeast India.

item.title: Cyle tour of Meghalaya: The Abode of clouds
item.description: Cycle tour of Meghalaya: The hills and valleys of Khasi and Jaintia hills.

item.title: Eastern Arunachal Pradesh & Upper Assam: Birth of the Brahmaputra | RIVER TRIP
item.description: Birth of the Mighty Brahmaputra This river journey takes you to eastern Arunachal Pradesh and Upper Assam.

item.title: Family Adventure Holiday in Meghalaya: Natures Amusement Park
item.description: Family adventure holiday in the Khasi & Jaintia hills of Meghalaya This Adventure holiday for the family is set in hilly Meghalaya.

item.title: Motorcycle & Overland Tour of Western Arunachal Pradesh: High roads of the Monyul
item.description: Motorcycle & Overland Tour of Western Arunachal Pradesh: Riding along the Bhutan and Tibetian borders This Motorcycle / Overland tour takes you to Western Arunachal Pradesh which includes some of the highest motorable roads of the eastern Himalayas.

item.title: Multi-activity holiday in Meghalaya: Hike, Bike, Nature & Culture
item.description: Multi-Activity Holiday in Meghalaya: Land of the matriarchs This particular Multi-activity tour takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills of Meghalaya.

item.title: Walking Holiday in Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Walks in India's far east
item.description: Walking Holiday in Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: Manjit Saikia
Laidback Leisure Tours in Northeast India
item.description: Holidays that take you away from the maddening crowds, kick off your shoes, destress and enjoy the serenity while we take care of the rest.

item.title: Visa & Permits
item.description: Our Wildlife & Culture Tours Visa Special Permits

item.title: Culture Tour of Arunachal Pradesh & Assam: Monyul & Brahmaputa Valley
item.description: Culture Tour of Arunachal Pradesh & Assam: Monyul and the Brahmaputra valley This cultural odessy takes you from the sweltering plains of the Brahmaputra to the high mountains of Western Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Cycle tour of Assam & Arunachal Pradesh: The Brahmaputra explorer
item.description: Cycle tour of Assam & Arunachal Pradesh: Cycling the physical heart of Northeastern India This cycle tour takes you along the length of the Brahmaputra River, across parts of Assam and Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Family Holiday in Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: India's far east
item.description: Family Holiday in Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Far eastern explorations This active family holiday of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh is set in some of the only flatlands of the state lying at the foothills of the Mishmi Hills (Himalayas eastern flank).

item.title: Motorcycle & Overland Tour of Assam & Arunachal Pradesh: Around the Brahmaputra
item.description: Motorcycle & Overland Tour of Assam and Arunachal Pradesh: Hills, Valleys, Forests, Rivers and Tribes Starting from central Assam we make our war east and north along the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: Multi-Activity tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Hike, Bike, Raft & Culture
item.description: Multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Birth of one of the Brahmaputra Valley This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River valley.

item.title: The Rainforest Trek: Trekking in Namdapha National Park of eastern Arunachal Pradesh
item.description: A trek in the worlds northernmost lowland rainforest This trekking holiday takes you to the Namdapha National Park located in eastern Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Iho Mitapo
Road Conditions
item.description: The Road condition across the northeastern states vary between excellent to the most atrocious.

item.title: Culture Tour of Arunachal Pradesh: Tribes of the 'Dawn lit Mountains'
item.description: A cultural odyssey across Arunachal Pradesh. The origins of the tribes that are currently living in Arunachal Pradesh remain shrouded in mystery.

item.title: Cycling Holiday in Meghalaya: The Trans-Meghalaya Explorer
item.description: Cycle Tour of Meghalaya: Cycling the Garo, Khasi and Jaintia hills The Trans Meghalaya cycling tour takes you across the three hill ranges of the state.

item.title: Trekking in Sikkim & W Bengal: Singalila Ridge and the Barsey Rhododendron Sanctuary
item.description: Trekking in Sikkim and W Bengal: A Trek amongst the giants This trek takes you to the hills of Sikkim and North Bengal, a mystical land of abundant natural beauty with verdant forests, quaint sub alpine villages and high towering mountains.

item.title: Joho Tayu
Safety
item.description: We offer Active Adventure tours for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

item.title: Culture Tour of Nagaland & Assam: Hornbill Festival and beyond
item.description: Culture Tour of Nagaland & Assam: Tribes & Wildlife, Nagaland & Assam This tour takes you to western Nagaland and central Assam.

item.title: Cycling in Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: The Mishmi Hills Explorer
item.description: Cycling in Eastern Arunachal Pradesh: Himalaya’s eastern flank The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas, this is where the mighty Himalayan chain ends (or starts).

item.title: Motorcycle & Overland Tour North East India: The Eastern Arc | 4 states
item.description: Motorcyle & Overland Tour of Northeast India: The wildest of Northeast India This particular ride takes us through the backroads of some of India’s easternmost states namely Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Assam and Meghalaya.

item.title: Trans-Bhutan Motorcycle & Overland Tour: The Thunder Dragon
item.description: Trans-Bhutan Motorcycle & Overland Tour: Gross national happiness experienced This trans-Bhutan motorcycle tour starts and ends in the Brahmaputra Valley of Assam.

item.title: Trekking in Western Arunachal Pradesh: The high lakes trek
item.description: Treking in Arunachal Pradesh: Ridge running along the Bhutanese frontier This particular trek is set in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt close to the tri-junction between India, Tibet and Bhutan.

item.title: Wildlife Tour of Arunachal Pradesh: Mishmi Hills Expedition
item.description: Cycling the Himalayan far east The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas.

item.title: Nongrum KD
Your Guides
item.description: The Team is one of the most experienced with years of field experience under the belt.

item.title: Cycle Tour of Sikkim & W Bengal: The Monastic Trail
item.description: Cycle Tour of Sikkim & W Bengal: Of Mountains and Monastries This cycling tour of Sikkim and West Bengal takes us through East, South and Western districts of Sikkim and the Darjeeling district of West Bengal.

item.title: Ahonda Menjo
Cycle tour of Western Arunachal Pradesh: The Himalayan High
item.description: Cycle Tour of Western Arunachal Pradesh: The Himalayan High This cycling tour of western Arunachal Pradesh takes you all the way to the periphery of beautiful Tawang, lying close to the trijuncture of India, Bhutan and Tibet.

item.title: Jaantu Gogoi
Bora Da
